attributes.action: Funding for all nurseries and childminders whilst open
attributes.additional_details: Some Local authorities are paying the settings and some are not. This is not fair it should be same for all settings that have to remain open.
attributes.background: If Nurseries and childminders have to stay open then they should all get their funding, even if the parent keeps the child at home to protect them from Covid-19

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567756

You might also like to sign this petition which calls for a related action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550767

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

The Government has also created an online service to help you find out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
